question.text:
Match List-I with List-II:
$\begin{array}{|l|l|r|l|}\hline & \text{List-I} & & \text{List-II} \\ \hline A. & \text{Histones} & I. & \text{Loosely packed chromatin} \\ \hline B. & \text{Nucleosome} & II. & \text{Densely packed Chromatin} \\ \hline C. & \text{Euchromatin} & III. & \text{Positively charged basic proteins} \\ \hline D. & \text{Heterochromatin} & IV. & \begin{array}{l} \text{DNA wrapped around histone} \\ \text{octamer} \end{array} \\ \hline\end{array}$

Choose the correct answer from the options given below:

solution.text:
$\begin{array}{lll} \text{Histones} & \rightarrow & \text{Positively charged basic proteins} \\ \text{Nucleosome} & \rightarrow & \text{DNA wrapped around histone octamer} \\ \text{Euchromatin} & \rightarrow & \text{Loosely packed chromatin} \\ \text{Heterochromatin} & \rightarrow & \text{Densely packed chromatin} \end{array}$

Hence the correct answer is option (4).
